CustomField.formula: IF( $UserRole.DeveloperName =="AO" && INCLUDES( Conf_Legal_Opini_Editor__c ,"AO"),True, IF( $UserRole.DeveloperName =="CA" && INCLUDES( Conf_Legal_Opini_Editor__c ,"CA"),True, IF( $UserRole.DeveloperName =="LAO" && INCLUDES( Conf_Legal_Opini_Editor__c ,"LAO"),True, IF( $UserRole.DeveloperName =="Marketing AO" && INCLUDES( Conf_Legal_Opini_Editor__c ,"Marketing AO"),True, IF( $UserRole.DeveloperName =="Spv AO" && INCLUDES( Conf_Legal_Opini_Editor__c ,"Spv AO"),True, False)))))
CustomField.label: Conf Legal Opini
